data.title: Fix mobile navigation issues with dynamic heatmaps & recordings

author.bio: Lucky Orange will help you answer the question of why 99% of visitors that visit your site never turn into customers.

data.useCase: Find and fix user experience issues with mobile navigation by evaluating visitor engagement through dynamic heatmaps and session recordings

steps.title: Use a dynamic heatmap software like Lucky Orange to view engagement with your mobile navigation elements like expandable menus
steps.content:
1. Some heatmap softwares are not dynamic and don’t allow you to evaluate user engagement with elements like overlays, expandable/hamburger menus or single-page apps.
  2. Start with a high impact page such as your home page or one that is a critical part of the conversion process

steps.title: Use the Elements option to see the parts of your site that received the most engagement from visitors
steps.content:
1. Elements are ordered by the number of clicks they received from visitors
  2. The warmer overlays - reds and oranges - to see where most visitors are engaging with your site.

steps.title: Look for engagement issues with aspects of your site that may be problematic for mobile visitors
steps.content:
1. See if expandable menus are working properly. You should see warmer overlays on the menu expand icon as well as items inside the menu. 
  2. Review CTA buttons and note the amount of user engagement
  3. Evaluate forms to make sure visitors can engage with all of the fields without having to pinch the screen or scroll for a lengthy period of time

steps.title: Compare engagement on mobile with engagement on desktop
steps.content:
1. Review a heatmap of the same page with traffic filtered to desktop users. 
  2. User engagement should be proportionate if your website is responsive. If you see significantly lower engagement with an element for mobile visitors than from desktop, it can be an indicator of a mobile-specific problem.

steps.title: If you find differences in engagement between mobile and desktop users, view recordings to see firsthand what the visitor experienced
steps.content:
1. Choose the Recordings menu to see a playback of a visitor engaging with the page
  2. Recordings are already filtered based on the parameters you set for the heatmap
